description: Numbers n such that (4n^2 + 1)/5 is prime.
references: L. Euler, De numeris primis valde magnis (E283), reprinted in: Opera Omnia. Teubner, Leipzig, 1911, Series (1), Vol. 3, p. 24.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
L. Euler, De numeris primis valde magnis (E283), The Euler Archive
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [4..410] | IsPrime((4*n^2+1) div 5)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 25 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
